io.github.jansky.ezroute

Class BusRoutesAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<BusRoutesAdapter.ViewHolder>
      • io.github.jansky.ezroute.BusRoutesAdapter

  • public class BusRoutesAdapter
extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<BusRoutesAdapter.ViewHolder>
    BusRoutesAdapter takes BusRouteActivities and will generate the list display structure for the BusRouteListActivity.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BusRoutesAdapter.ViewHolder
      The inner ViewHolder encapsulates the structure of the activity_bus_route layout and assigns the text values to the appropriate locations

      int getItemCount()

      • BusRoutesAdapter

        BusRoutesAdapter(android.content.Context context,
                 java.util.List<BusRoute> busRoutes)
        BusRoutesAdapter takes in BusRoutes and generates the visual activity_bus_route seen on the screen
        Parameters:
        context - context of the application
        busRoutes - a list of BusRoutes sorted in order of which bus needs to be boarded first
